Package preferences

Class ApplicationPreferencesModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • preferences.ApplicationPreferencesModel
  • public class ApplicationPreferencesModel
extends java.lang.Object
    An instance of this class stores the application preferences, the stocks in the watchlist and the opened chart frames. It is stored persistently when the application closes and reconstructed when it restarts.

      • setDataProviderActive

        public void setDataProviderActive​(int index)
        Moves the data provider with the specified index to the top of the list. The provider at the top is active.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the data provider to activate

      • getDataProviderList

        public java.util.ArrayList<DataProvider> getDataProviderList()

        Returns:
        the data provider list

      • setDataProviderList

        public void setDataProviderList​(java.util.ArrayList<DataProvider> dataProviderList)
        Sets the data provider list. Used by the preferences controller to restore the data provider list on program start.
        Parameters:
        dataProviderList - the new data provider list

        public java.util.List<ChartDataStorageForPersistence> getOpenedChartsData()

        Returns:
        the opened charts data

      • setOpenedChartsData

        public void setOpenedChartsData​(java.util.List<ChartDataStorageForPersistence> openedCharts)
        Sets the opened charts data. Used to store information about charts prior to shutdown.
        Parameters:
        openedCharts - the new opened charts data
